attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain is one of the filthiest countries in the developed world, and current anti litter campaigns have not worked. We believe that the only guaranteed solution is to compel local authorities to maintain the cleanliness of all public spaces at all times (including highway verges), and to fund this additional cost through local litter taxes on the purveyors and distributors of litter (i.e. take-away food outlets and supermarkets).
